column4: Hello, Can someone point me to the right direction? I just installed ubuntu and Grub does not see Vista... I installed ubuntu on partition 3 of my HD.. vista is on partition 4
The partitions were already there, I just selected it during ubuntu install
grub goes straight into ubuntu.. it does not see vista
you have to edit your menu.list
sudo gedit /boot/grub/menu.lst then add in the windows option
